segments.text: May and Daniel often like this kind of weather .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , they can enjoy themselves in the day time and it is not so hot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Honey , how about taking them to the beach this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since last time we've climbed the mountain , we haven't gone out for a long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And this kind of weather is rare for the season either .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I remember last year this time , the weather is so hot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So we must seize this chance to go the beach .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Daniel loves the beach very much !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He will enjoy himself this weekend .
segments.speaker: S2
